price: (Ey Muhamməd!) De: “Murdar şeyin çox olması sənin xoşuna gəlsə belə, murdarla təmiz eyni ola bilməz”. Ey ağıl sahibləri! Allahdan qorxun ki, bəlkə nicat tapasınız.
arabic: قُل لَّا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡخَبِيثُ وَٱلطَّيِّبُ وَلَوۡ أَعۡجَبَكَ كَثۡرَةُ ٱلۡخَبِيثِۚ فَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qul lā yastawī al-khabīthu wal-ṭayibu walaw aʿjabaka kathratu al-khabīthi fa-ittaqū al-laha yāulī al-albābi laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
